content: bonfire jumper version 1 intro i designed this jumper to suit the seasonal subscription boxes i receive from lauren aston designs the wool is fabulous and i am totally addicted this jumper is a true to size fit designed to have approximately 5cm positive ease mine is a waist length fit however feel free to make it as long or as short as you wish please bare in mine adding length will require more wool sizes s m l bust measurement 90cm 100cm 110cm nb i made a size small and measure a 90cm bust gauge 7sts x 9-10rows 10x10cm materials & equipment required 15mm circular needles 15mm dpns for sleeves 10mm circular needles 10mm dpns for sleeves lauren aston designs super chunky wool 100g/60m small = 450g 270m medium = 550g 330m large = 700g 420m quantity is an estimate and may vary on how long prefer your jumper to be sewing needle 2 @knitting_hannah instructions yoke cast on 38 40 42 stitches on 10mm circular needles rounds 1-4 k1 p1 change to 15mm circular needles round 5 knit the round whilst setting up raglan stitches as follows small beginning of round marker k2 pm k1 pm k2 pm k1 pm k15 pm k1 pm k2 pm k1 pm k13 medium beginning of round marker k2 pm k1 pm k2 pm k1 pm k16 pm k1 pm k2 pm k1 pm k14 large beginning of round marker k2 pm k1 pm k2 pm k1 pm k17 pm k1 pm k2 pm k1 pm k15 use a different style marker to denote beginning of the round if following colour changes change to a different colour now and every 4 row from now round 6 knit to the first marker m1r sm k1 sm m1l knit to the next marker m1r sm k1 sm m1l knit to the next marker 3 @knitting_hannah m1r sm k1 sm m1l knit to the next marker m1r sm k1 sm m1l knit to the beginning of the round 8sts increased round 7 knit the whole round small -
